name: Different Passwords
description: Use a different password for each of your online accounts.

name: Strong Passowrds
description: Ensure that each passphrase is strong (ideally 12+ characters, including numbers, symbols, upper and lowercase letters, but not dictionary words, names or places)

name: Update Important Passwords
description: Change all important passwords at least once a year

name: Store Securly
description: Don"t write passwords down anywhere that they could be found. Don"t store in plain text

name: Password Manager
description: Consider using a password manager to generate, store and fill your passwords securly
